bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Gus Bendjus. Indictment
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Second District of Washington Territory

div1.p: In the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory holding terms at Montesano for Chehalis County. WT.

Gus Bendjus, Robert Shanglund, Ben Frederickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Strongburger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson Leander Brown, John Saxen, John Thompson, Alez Agran, Thomas Jacobs, E. Emil, Andrew Anderson, and Chalres Burke are accused by the grand jury of Chehalis County, Washington Territory by this indictment of its crime of Malicious Michief committed as follows, to wit, the raid, Gus Bendjus, Robert Shanglund, Ben Frederickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Strongburger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxen, John Thompson, Alex Agren
THomas Jacobs, E Emil, Andrew Anderson and Charles Burke on the 9th day of September AD 1887 and in the night time, in the said County of Chehalis in the said Second Judicial District in the Territory of Washington. Then and there being, one Pound rut, of its value of $600.00, the property of one Wilson Graham, then & there being and situate in the said County and Territory, thereby maliciously intending to inquire and destory work Poundhut, did wilfully, maliciously, unlawfully, feloniously and with violace towards and against said Wilson Graham cut, tear, pull down, injure and destroy, to the great damage of the said Wilson Graham.
Contrary to the statute in such case made and provided, and against the peace & dignity of the Territory of Washington.
George J. Moody Prosecuting Attorney Second Judicial District Washington Territory
